question: Write a letter to your neighbor requesting that something be done about the dog. Include in yourletter:– Your reason for writing– What you would like to happen– A nice, respectful style
text: I am writing this letter to express my annoyance about the barking of your lovely dog ‘Harry’ all
The main reason for this complaint is the overwhelmingly negative effect of this woof on my
sleeping hours at night. Since I have to clock in by 7 early in the morning, I should go to bed quite
earlier. This time complies with the moment your dog starts barking and running onto the floor. I
know you are aware of my respect for animal rights, but this bark seems to me an unusual
reflection of a dog with a possible disorder. Additionally, this may be a sign of a request on its part
I hope that this letter does not offend you, as I am only trying to get myself some comfort at home.
If you would like to further discuss this, please contact me at your convenience. I hope we can resolve
I look forward to hearing from you soon
